HomePage.metaTitle: Age Calculator: How old am I in Hijri and Gregorian?
HomePage.metaDescription: Use the accurate "Kam Omri" age calculator to find out your detailed age (years, months, days) in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars. Enter your date of birth and discover when your next birthday is!
HomePage.mainTitle: Accurate Age Calculator â€“ Calculate Your Age in Years and Days
HomePage.intro: The "Kam Omri" website is your ideal tool to calculate your age accurately and easily, whether in the Gregorian or Hijri calendar. Have you ever wondered, "How old am I exactly in years, months, and days?" or "When is my next Hijri birthday?". We provide you with comprehensive and detailed answers.
HomePage.howItWorksTitle: How does the "Kam Omri" calculator work?
HomePage.howItWorksDesc: Simply choose your preferred input method (Gregorian or Hijri), then enter your date of birth using the dropdowns for day, month, and year. After clicking the "Calculate Your Age" button, our smart tool will display a wealth of valuable information about your age.
HomePage.whatYouGetIntro: When you use the "Kam Omri" calculator, you will get:
whatYouGetPoints: Your age in the Gregorian calendar: detailed in years, months, and days.
Your age in the Hijri calendar: detailed in years, months, and days.
Your corresponding birth date: If you enter your birth date in Gregorian, the tool will display the corresponding Hijri date, and vice versa.
A live counter for your age: Watch your age increase before your eyes in years, months, days, hours, minutes, and even seconds!

Countdown to your next birthday: Get ready for your next celebration! The tool accurately displays the remaining time until your next birthday, whether it's Gregorian or Hijri, based on how you entered your birth date.
HomePage.whyUseDesc1: The "Kam Omri" tool is designed to be user-friendly with a full Arabic interface that supports right-to-left alignment. We use precise algorithms to calculate age and convert dates, taking into account the specifics of both calendars to provide reliable results. Whether you want to know your age for a special occasion, to track the passage of time, or just out of curiosity, "Kam Omri" is your first destination.
HomePage.whyUseDesc2: Note: Age calculation in the Hijri calendar is based on the arithmetic (civil) Hijri calendar and may differ by one day from calendars based on moon sighting, such as the Umm al-Qura calendar. Enjoy learning the details of your age and share the site with your friends!

AboutPage.metaTitle: About Us | The "Kam Omri" Team | Our Mission and Vision for the Age Calculator
AboutPage.metaDescription: Meet the passionate team behind the "Kam Omri" website. Discover our mission to provide an accurate and easy-to-use age calculator that supports both Hijri and Gregorian calendars, and our vision to serve you better.
AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.p1: Welcome to "Kam Omri"! We are a passionate team dedicated to providing easy-to-use and useful tools for everyone. Our main goal with this site is to offer an accurate and reliable age calculator that allows you to know your detailed age in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars.
AboutPage.p2: We understand that knowing one's age accurately, or tracking the time remaining for a special occasion like a birthday, can be important to many. Therefore, we worked on developing the "Kam Omri" tool to be simple in its design, powerful in its functionality, and fully supportive of the Arabic language, considering the right-to-left text direction to provide the best possible user experience for our Arab audience.
AboutPage.p3: At "Kam Omri", we believe that technology should serve humanity, and we strive to make information related to time and dates accessible and easy to understand. Our calculations are based on standard algorithms to ensure accuracy as much as possible, taking into account the differences between the Gregorian and Hijri calendars.
AboutPage.p4: Thank you for visiting our site and using our tool. We hope you find it useful and enjoyable. If you have any suggestions or feedback, please do not hesitate to <link>contact us</link>. We are always happy to hear your opinions, which help us develop and improve our services.

ContactPage.metaTitle: Contact "Kam Omri" | Questions, Suggestions, and Technical Support
ContactPage.metaDescription: Have a question or suggestion for the "Kam Omri" website? Contact us easily via email. Our team is ready to help and answer your inquiries about our age calculator and services.
ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.p1: At "Kam Omri", we are always happy to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a great idea to improve the site, or even just want to say hello, our team is here to listen and respond. We believe that your communication is the key to our development, and we look forward to receiving your valuable messages.

ContactPage.p2: Thank you for your trust in "Kam Omri". Your feedback and suggestions are a source of inspiration for us, and we always look forward to helping make your experience better.

PrivacyPage.metaTitle: Privacy Policy for "Kam Omri" | How We Protect Your Data
PrivacyPage.metaDescription: Discover how "Kam Omri" protects your privacy. In this privacy policy, we explain how your data is processed (and not collected) when using the age calculator, and our commitment to protecting your information.
PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.p1: At "Kam Omri", the privacy of our visitors is of extreme importance to us. This privacy policy document outlines the types of personal information that are not collected or received by "Kam Omri" and how the information is (or is not) used.
PrivacyPage.processedInfoDesc: When you use the age calculator tool on "Kam Omri", all the data you enter (date of birth) is processed directly in your browser (Client-Side). We do not collect, store, or transmit the dates of birth or any other personal information you enter into the age calculator on our servers. The entire process takes place locally on your device.
PrivacyPage.cookiesDesc: "Kam Omri" may use essential cookies to improve user experience and ensure the site functions correctly. These cookies do not track personal information. We may use third-party analytics services (like Google Analytics) which may use cookies to collect non-personal information about how visitors use the site (such as pages visited, duration of visit, etc.). This information helps us understand how our site is used and improve it. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.
PrivacyPage.sharingDesc: We do not share any personal data with third parties, simply because we do not collect it through the age calculator tool. Aggregated analytical information (if any) is anonymous and used only for site improvement purposes.
PrivacyPage.linksDesc: Our site may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. Note that we do not operate these external sites. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
PrivacyPage.securityDesc: Since we do not collect birth date data on our servers, the risk of this data being compromised on our end is non-existent. The security of your data when entered locally depends on the security of your device and browser.
PrivacyPage.changesDesc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
PrivacyPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to <link>contact us</link>.
